scripts.dev: pnpx concurrently --names back,front 'pnpx tsx --watch backend/src/server.ts' 'cd frontend && pnpm run dev'
scripts.dev:npm: npx concurrently --names back,front 'npx tsx --watch backend/src/server.ts' 'cd frontend && npm run dev'
scripts.build: pnpm i && cd frontend && pnpm i && pnpm run build && cd ../backend && pnpm --package=typescript dlx tsc
scripts.build:npm: npm i && cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && cd ../backend && tsc
scripts.dev:bun: bun x concurrently --names back-front 'bun --watch run backend/src/server' 'cd frontend && bun run --bun dev'
scripts.install-full: pnpm i && cd frontend && pnpm i && cd ../backend && pnpm i && cd ..
scripts.install-full:npm: npm i && cd frontend && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i && cd ..
scripts.install-full:bun: bun i && cd frontend && bun i && cd ../backend && bun i && cd ..
